tentaCLAW.name: tentaC.L.A.W.
tentaCLAW.desc: a chitinsteel tentacle-claw, extending from your core. roots into the ground and consumes minerals beneath the surface. due to your encryption protocol, each successive tentaclaw's biohash is increasingly expensive to mineralize.

solarTurf.name: solar turf
solarTurf.desc: a lightweight roll of flexible solar silicon. deployed efficiently via a pneumatic cannon. the first few turfs are close and easy to dispatch, but later ones require a great dedication of energy.

mineralSilo.name: mineral silo
mineralSilo.desc: a fortified silo that extends your built-in compartments, allowing you to store more minerals.

chemBattery.name: chem battery
chemBattery.desc: molten salts bathing with antifreeze in a sealed tank, perfectly composed to store more of your energy.
